languages.text: {n}Ваше сознание — осколок. Выброшенный в ничто, визжащий сонмом тысяч жизней... Ваших? Чужих? Кровавые трещины ветвятся, вгрызаясь в каждый клочок разрозненных мыслей, терзают, жаждут разбить то ничтожное "я", что от вас осталось. Где-то в глубине клокочет крик, мольба прекратить мучения, раствориться в беспамятстве... Но нет, что-то вцепилось в вас когтями — и держит, сплавляет воедино, осколок за осколком, мучительно и методично нанизывая куски вашей личности на раскаленную нить бытия в попытке обогнать всепоглощающее забвение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Монолог на черном фоне — "Что я? Я что-то чувствую?" К РТ постепенно возвращается осознание бытия.

languages.text: {n}Your mind is a loose shard, cast out into nothing, screaming in the voices of thousands of lives... Are they your lives? Or do they belong to another? The blood cracks branch out, biting into every scrap of disjointed thought, ravaging, hungering to shatter what little of your own self remains. A cry gurgles in the depths: a plea to make the torment stop and let you dissolve in unconsciousness... But something has sunk its claws into you, keeping you in place, fusing you back together piece by piece. Methodically and tortuously, it continues to skewer the shreds of your identity onto the thread of existence in an attempt to outpace the all-consuming void.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваше сознание — осколок. Выброшенный в ничто, визжащий сонмом тысяч жизней... Ваших? Чужих? Кровавые трещины ветвятся, вгрызаясь в каждый клочок разрозненных мыслей, терзают, жаждут разбить то ничтожное "я", что от вас осталось. Где-то в глубине клокочет крик, мольба прекратить мучения, раствориться в беспамятстве... Но нет, что-то вцепилось в вас когтями — и держит, сплавляет воедино, осколок за осколком, мучительно и методично нанизывая куски вашей личности на раскаленную нить бытия в попытке обогнать всепоглощающее забвение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your mind is a loose shard. Drifting in a purple cloud, it does not remember ever seeing, hearing, or feeling anything. Were you ever truly alive? Or did you always surrender to the flow, not bound by the fetters of corporeality?..{/n}

{n}Your mind is a loose shard. Cast out into nothing, screaming in the voices of thousands of lives... Are they your lives? Or do they belong to another? The blood cracks branch out, biting into every scrap of disjointed thoughts, ravaging, hungering to shatter what little of your own self remains. A cry gurgles in the depths, a plea to make the torment stop and let you dissolve in unconsciousness... But something has sunk its claws in you, keeping you, fusing you back together piece by piece. Methodically and tortuously, it continues to skewer scraps of your identity onto the thread of existence in an attempt to outpace the all-consuming void.{/n}

{n}Your mind is a loose shard. Adrift in a purple cloud, it does not remember ever seeing, hearing, or feeling anything. Were you ever truly alive? Or did you always surrender to the flow like this, not bound by the fetters of corporeality...?{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的思维变成了无拘无束的碎片，被抛向虚无之中，在成千上万的片段中放声尖叫……那些片段是来自你的过往吗？还是别人的记忆？你的血脉如同树枝般延伸，刺入每块支离破碎的思想碎片。它们肆虐着，试图粉碎你仅存的一点点自我意识。你的意识深处传来了痛苦的哀嚎，乞求让这场折磨停止，让你迷失在虚无之中……然而，有什么东西却将利爪刺入了你的身体，让你依然保持着原本的形态，将你的一点一滴重新融合起来。它仿佛行刑一般，有条不紊地拼凑着你的灵魂，将碎片串联在线索的丝线上，抵抗着吞噬一切的虚无。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a loose shard, cast out into nothing, screaming in the voices of thousands of lives... Are they your lives? Or do they belong to another? The blood cracks branch out, biting into every scrap of disjointed thought, ravaging, hungering to shatter what little of your own self remains. A cry gurgles in the depths: a plea to make the torment stop and let you dissolve in unconsciousness... But something has sunk its claws into you, keeping you in place, fusing you back together piece by piece. Methodically and tortuously, it continues to skewer the shreds of your identity onto the thread of existence in an attempt to outpace the all-consuming void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的思维变成了无拘无束的碎片，被抛向虚无之中，在成千上万的片段中放声尖叫……那些片段是来自你的过往吗？还是别人的记忆？你的血脉如同树枝般延伸，刺入每块支离破碎的思想碎片。它们肆虐着，试图粉碎你仅存的一点点自我意识。你的意识深处传来了痛苦的哀嚎，乞求让这场折磨停止，让你迷失在虚无之中……然而，有什么东西却将利爪刺入了你的身体，让你依然保持着原本的形态，将你的一点一滴重新融合起来。它仿佛行刑一般，有条不紊地拼凑着你的灵魂，将碎片串联在线索的丝线上，抵抗着吞噬一切的虚无。{/n}
{n}你的思维变得四分五裂，漂浮在紫色的云朵中，完全不记得你曾看到、听到、感觉到的一切。你真的存在过吗？还是说，你从始至终都是个不羁的灵魂，完全不受肉体的束缚……？{/n}
{n}你的思维变得四分五裂，漂浮在紫色的云朵中，完全不记得你曾看到、听到、感觉到的一切。你真的存在过吗？还是说，你从始至终都是个不羁的灵魂，完全不受肉体的束缚……？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu mente es un fragmento suelto, lanzado a la nada, que grita con las voces de millares de vidas... ¿Son tus vidas? ¿O pertenecen a otros? Las grietas de sangre se extienden, clavándose en cada retazo de unos pensamientos dispersos. Voraces, buscan hacer añicos lo poco que queda de tu ser. En las profundidades, retumba un grito gutural. Una súplica para que cese el tormento y puedas sumirte en la inconsciencia... Pero algo te ha clavado sus garras, inmovilizándote y reconstruyéndote trozo a trozo. De forma metódica y tortuosa, empala los jirones de tu identidad para coserlos al tejido de la existencia, intentando adelantarse al vacío devorador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a loose shard, cast out into nothing, screaming in the voices of thousands of lives... Are they your lives? Or do they belong to another? The blood cracks branch out, biting into every scrap of disjointed thought, ravaging, hungering to shatter what little of your own self remains. A cry gurgles in the depths: a plea to make the torment stop and let you dissolve in unconsciousness... But something has sunk its claws into you, keeping you in place, fusing you back together piece by piece. Methodically and tortuously, it continues to skewer the shreds of your identity onto the thread of existence in an attempt to outpace the all-consuming void.{/n}

{n}Tu mente es como un fragmento suelto. Flota a la deriva en una nube púrpura, y no recuerda haber visto, oído ni sentido nada jamás. ¿Alguna vez estuviste realmente {rt_mf|vivo|viva}? ¿O siempre te dejaste llevar por la corriente como ahora, libre de las ataduras de la corporeidad...?{/n}

{n}Tu mente es como un fragmento suelto. Flota a la deriva en una nube púrpura, y no recuerda haber visto, oído ni sentido nada jamás. ¿Alguna vez estuviste realmente {rt_mf|vivo|viva}? ¿O siempre te dejaste llevar por la corriente como ahora, libre de las ataduras de la corporeidad...?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zihnin; binlerce canın sesinin çığlık savurduğu, gevşek bir kıymık gibi... Bunlar senin hayatların mı? Yoksa başkalarına mı aitler? Kan çatlakları dallanıp budaklanıyor; birbirlerinden kopuk düşüncelerin her bir parçasını ısırıyor, yakıp yıkıyor, senden geriye kalan azıcık şeyi de parçalama açlığı çekiyorlar. Derinlerden bir çığlık yükseliyor: İşkencenin durması ve bilinçsizlik içinde erimene müsaade edilmesi için bir yalvarış... Bir şey pençelerini sana batırıyor, seni olduğun yerde kavrıyor, parça parça bir araya getiriyor. Metodik ve dolambaçlı bir şekilde, her şeyi tüketen uçsuzu aşmak için kimliğinin parçalarını varoluşun ipliğine geçirmeye devam ediyor.{/n}

A cry gurgles in the depths: a plea to make the torment stop and let you dissolve in unconsciousness... But something has sunk its claws into you, keeping you in place, fusing you back together piece by piece. Methodically and tortuously, it continues to skewer the shreds of your identity onto the thread of existence in an attempt to outpace the all-consuming void.{/n}

Kan çatlakları dallanıp budaklanıyor; birbirlerinden kopuk düşüncelerin her bir parçasını ısırıyor, yakıp yıkıyor, senden geriye kalan azıcık şeyi de parçalama açlığı çekiyorlar. Bir şey pençelerini sana batırıyor, seni olduğun yerde kavrıyor, parça parça bir araya getiriyor. {n}Zihnin, gevşek bir kıymık gibi. Mor bir bulutta sürüklenirken daha önce ne gördüğünü, duyduğunu ya da hissettiğini hatırlamıyor. Gerçekten hiç yaşamış mıydın? Yoksa her zaman böyle, bedenliliğin prangalarına vurulmadan akışa teslim mi olmuştun?{/n}

{n}Zihnin, gevşek bir kıymık gibi. Mor bir bulutta sürüklenirken daha önce ne gördüğünü, duyduğunu ya da hissettiğini hatırlamıyor. Gerçekten hiç yaşamış mıydın? Yoksa her zaman böyle, bedenliliğin prangalarına vurulmadan akışa teslim mi olmuştun?{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの心は宙をさまよう砕けた破片となり、何もない虚空の中で何千もの命の声をあげて叫んでいる…それらはあなた自身の命なのか？それとも他者のものなのか？血の亀裂が枝分かれしながら広がり、ばらばらになった思考の断片すべてに喰らいつき、引き裂き、飢えたようにあなたの残された自己を打ち砕こうとしている。深淵からぐつぐつと沸き上がる叫びは、この苦痛を終わらせ、意識のない闇に溶けたいという哀願…だが何かがあなたに爪を食い込ませ、そこにとどまらせ、ばらばらになったあなたを一つずつ再構築していく。冷酷に、そして苦痛を伴いながら、その何かはあなたのアイデンティティの断片を存在という糸に串刺しにしていく。すべてを呑み込もうとする虚無に追いつかれる前に、早く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a loose shard, cast out into nothing, screaming in the voices of thousands of lives... Are they your lives? Or do they belong to another? The blood cracks branch out, biting into every scrap of disjointed thought, ravaging, hungering to shatter what little of your own self remains. A cry gurgles in the depths: a plea to make the torment stop and let you dissolve in unconsciousness... But something has sunk its claws into you, keeping you in place, fusing you back together piece by piece. Methodically and tortuously, it continues to skewer the shreds of your identity onto the thread of existence in an attempt to outpace the all-consuming void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの心は宙をさまよう砕けた破片となり、何もない虚空の中で何千もの命の声をあげて叫んでいる…それらはあなた自身の命なのか？それとも他者のものなのか？血の亀裂が枝分かれしながら広がり、ばらばらになった思考の断片すべてに喰らいつき、引き裂き、飢えたようにあなたの残された自己を打ち砕こうとしている。深淵からぐつぐつと沸き上がる叫びは、この苦痛を終わらせ、意識のない闇に溶けたいという哀願…だが何かがあなたに爪を食い込ませ、そこにとどまらせ、ばらばらになったあなたを一つずつ再構築していく。冷酷に、そして苦痛を伴いながら、その何かはあなたのアイデンティティの断片を存在という糸に串刺しにしていく。すべてを呑み込もうとする虚無に追いつかれる前に、早く。{/n}
{n}あなたの心はバラバラな欠片である。紫色の雲を漂い、かつて見聞きしたもの、感じたものを思い出せない。本当に生きていたのだろうか？あるいは、いつもこのような流れに身を任せて、肉体という束縛などなかったのだろうか？{/n}
{n}あなたの心はバラバラな欠片である。紫色の雲を漂い、かつて見聞きしたもの、感じたものを思い出せない。本当に生きていたのだろうか？あるいは、いつもこのような流れに身を任せて、肉体という束縛などなかったのだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre esprit n'est plus qu'un fragment isolé, lancé dans le néant, hurlant dans les voix de milliers de vies... S'agit-il de vos propres existences ? Ou de celles d'autres êtres ? Le sang coule et s'immisce dans la moindre craquelure, s'agrippant et dévorant chacune de vos pensées, prêt à annihiler jusqu'au dernier fragment de vous-même. Un cri semblable à un gargouillis résonne dans les profondeurs : une supplique pour mettre fin à ces tourments et vous laisser enfin vous dissoudre dans l'inconscient... Mais quelque chose a planté ses griffes en vous et vous maintient fermement en place tandis qu'il rassemble vos fragments l'un après l'autre. Méthodiquement, il raccommode douloureusement les lambeaux de votre identité sur le fil de l'existence, dans une tentative de triompher du néant dévorant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a loose shard, cast out into nothing, screaming in the voices of thousands of lives... Are they your lives? Or do they belong to another? The blood cracks branch out, biting into every scrap of disjointed thought, ravaging, hungering to shatter what little of your own self remains. A cry gurgles in the depths: a plea to make the torment stop and let you dissolve in unconsciousness... But something has sunk its claws into you, keeping you in place, fusing you back together piece by piece. Methodically and tortuously, it continues to skewer the shreds of your identity onto the thread of existence in an attempt to outpace the all-consuming void.{/n}

{n}Votre esprit n'est plus qu'un fragment isolé, à la dérive dans un nuage pourpre. Il ne se souvient pas d'avoir déjà vu, entendu ou senti quoi que ce soit. Étiez-vous véritablement en vie auparavant ? Ou vous êtes vous toujours {rt_mf|abandonné|abandonnée} au courant ainsi, sans avoir jamais été {rt_mf|lié|liée} par les entraves de la corporalité... ?{/n}

{n}Votre esprit n'est plus qu'un fragment isolé, à la dérive dans un nuage pourpre. Il ne se souvient pas d'avoir déjà vu, entendu ou senti quoi que ce soit. Étiez-vous véritablement en vie auparavant ? Ou vous êtes vous toujours {rt_mf|abandonné|abandonnée} au courant ainsi, sans avoir jamais été {rt_mf|lié|liée} par les entraves de la corporalité... ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Verstand ist eine lose Scherbe. Ins Nichts geworfen schreit sie mit den Stimmen Tausender Leben ... Sind das deine Leben? Oder gehören sie jemand anderem? Das brechende Blut breitet sich aus, beißt in jeden zerfahrenen Gedanken und hungert danach, das Wenige, das von dir geblieben ist, zu verschlingen. Ein Schrei gurgelt in den Tiefen: ein Flehen, die Qualen zu beenden und dich in Bewusstlosigkeit versinken zu lassen ... Aber etwas hat seine Klauen in dich geschlagen, hält dich fest und fügt dich Stück für Stück wieder zusammen. Methodisch und gewunden spießt es die Fetzen deiner Identität auf den Faden der Existenz, um der alles verzehrenden Leere zu entgehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a loose shard, cast out into nothing, screaming in the voices of thousands of lives... Are they your lives? Or do they belong to another? The blood cracks branch out, biting into every scrap of disjointed thought, ravaging, hungering to shatter what little of your own self remains. A cry gurgles in the depths: a plea to make the torment stop and let you dissolve in unconsciousness... But something has sunk its claws into you, keeping you in place, fusing you back together piece by piece. Methodically and tortuously, it continues to skewer the shreds of your identity onto the thread of existence in an attempt to outpace the all-consuming void.{/n}

Das brechende Blut breitet sich aus, beißt in jeden zerfahrenen Gedanken und hungert danach, das Wenige, das von dir geblieben ist, zu verschlingen. Ein Schrei gurgelt in den Tiefen: ein Flehen, die Qualen zu beenden und dich in Bewusstlosigkeit versinken zu lassen ... Methodisch und gewunden spießt es die Fetzen deiner Identität auf den Faden der Existenz, um der alles verzehrenden Leere zu entgehen.{/n}

{n}Dein Verstand ist eine lose Scherbe. Er schwebt in einer violetten Wolke und erinnert sich nicht, jemals etwas gesehen, gehört oder gefühlt zu haben. Warst du jemals wirklich am Leben? Oder hast du dich immer nur dem Strom hingegeben, ungebunden durch die Fesseln der Körperlichkeit?{/n}
